hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Zelda's Lullaby#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #the Serenade of Water#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right
